lang.noSymbol: Please specify a cryptocurrency symbol (example: btc).
lang.invalidSymbol: Please enter a valid cryptocurrency symbol (example: btc).
lang.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again in a moment.

helpFields.name: $price <symbol>
helpFields.value:
Displays the current price of the specified cryptocurrency.
For example, to get the price of Bitcoin, type: `$price btc`
